Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
Occupying pride of place at the front of an established trio of freestanding residences, this solid three bedroom home with its own street frontage provides abundant living space in a position of convenience. Upon entry, the wide hallway features polished floors revealing the bright, carpeted formal lounge, a sophisticated entertaining area. Across the hall, the master bedroom boasts a walk-in wardrobe and a spacious ensuite. The home extends to the open kitchen, dining and family area, displaying polished floors and double doors directly accessing the paved alfresco area and garden, creating a flow of indoor/outdoor living. Featuring high ceilings, stainless-steel appliances including a 5-burner gas cooktop and a dishwasher, the large kitchen will entice keen cooks! Two more bedrooms with built-in wardrobes share a contemporary family bathroom with a separate shower and bathtub, adjacent to a separate toilet. The remote-controlled double garage offers both external and internal access and further highlights include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, with ample storage. Just metres from the vibrant Croydon North shopping strip, enjoy fabulous local convenience and a quick trip to Ringwood and EastLink.
Insights: Croydon North VIC 3136 was last sold in 2011 and 16 other 3 bedroom unit in Croydon North have recently been sold.

Description:
Quality Living In A Blue Chip Location
Phone Code for this property is: 5032
Townhouse 3: 2BR + STUDY, 2.5 BTH, 1 CAR GARAGE
Located less than 15 minutes from the Melbourne CBD, Q1 is a collection of seven architecturally designed townhouses offering a modern lifestyle, which appeals to both the savvy investor and owner-occupier alike.
Expressive architecture and contemporary interiors exude style and function throughout each residence perfectly reflecting modern Essendon living. Enhancing the functional side of bathrooms Q1 has incorporated classic floor-to-ceiling tiles reflecting the contemporary interior and the light colour scheme throughout.
Features and Fittings Include:
- Boutique Development of only 7 dwellings
- Open plan living with private terraces & courtyards
- Secure car park to each property
- Tasmanian Oak Floorboards to open plan living areas
- Stainless Steel SMEG Kitchen Appliances
- Stone Benchtops
- Spacious showers with semi-frameless glass screens to bathrooms
- Essendon Shopping Strip & Restaurant District, just a stroll away.
- Keilor Road Retail & Restaurant District, just a stroll away. - Puckle Street Retail & Restaurant District, 5 minutes away.
Other Amenities include:
- Essendon North Primary School 750m
- Lowther Hall Anglican Grammar 1.9km
- Penleigh & Essendon Grammar School 2.3km - University of Melbourne 8.1km
- University of Melbourne 6.0km
- Melbourne CBD less than 20 minutes
- Essendon Railway Station 5 minutes
- Essendon Bus Station 5 minutes
- Tram Stop 46 100m
- Maribyrnong Parks 3.2km
- Aberfeldie Park 2.2km
Internal area
141.9m²

Description:
Extended Elegance with Perfect Parkland Proximity
Please register your interest in this property so that we can ensure you are included in the Virtual Auction and/or contacted in the event the property is going to be sold prior to the Virtual Auction 16th October at 5pm.
Please contact us via email or phone to speak about your options to privately inspect this property. Thank you
In one of Essendon's premier neighbourhoods, this captivating 4BR Californian benefits from a significant extension and first-class renovations to deliver an aspirational lifestyle of quality and versatility - all with the open spaces of Woodlands Park at the end of the street. A beautiful blend of classic and contemporary, the home's inviting interior comprises a large master bedroom with WIR and private ensuite, two additional bedrooms (BIRs), home office/4BR and luxurious main bathroom complete with frameless shower and freestanding tub. Enhancing its family appeal is a spacious open-plan living/dining area complemented by a tastefully-appointed kitchen with stone benchtops, soft-close drawers and Fisher & Paykel appliances (dishwasher, 900mm oven and gas cooktop). Other stand-out features include ducted heating and split-system a/c, additional ceiling fans (main bedrooms), high ceilings, solid hardwood floors and large laundry with ample linen cupboards. Dual bi-folds from the living area reveal a fabulous backyard setting complete with al-fresco entertaining deck, integrated BBQ, fridge and bench seating, along with a heated pool with automated filtration and travertine paved surrounds, plus the added appeal of front off-street parking. An idyllic family lifestyle with a location to match, it's also walking distance to North Essendon Village cafes, shops and supermarket, Mt Alexander Road trams, Glenbervie Station, close to local schools and easy access to Citylink.
*** COVID-19 Announcement ***
If you're attending a Private Appointment, we request that you only attend if you are fit and healthy to do so and not under any self-isolation conditions. We request that you maintain a healthy distance from our team and refrain from touching any items/fixtures and doors within the property. You must wear a face mask and we will provide gloves for your appointment. If you would like to view something in particular, please request the agent's assistance. Thank you.

Description:
Lifestyle apartment, Enviable location
Offering a secure low maintenance contemporary lifestyle in one of Melbourne's most sought after locales. This one bedroom apartment with secure basement car stacker plus storage is sure to impress. Take the lift and discover the appeal of this south facing apartment with an undercover terrace, open plan living, generous kitchen including stone benchtops, SMEG stainless steel appliances, integrated fridge and dishwasher. There is a laundry/bathroom including a double shower.
Premium fitout features timber floors in the living zone, mirrored splashback, plenty of kitchen storage and intercom security entry. The apartment is within walking distance to the Strathmore Station, local shops and Woodland Street cafes, Five Mile Creek Reserve and has easy access to City link. The apartment is currently leased until 06/04/20 and returning $1521 pcm.
Inspection by appointment only
COVID-19 and OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS - We are committed to the health and safety of our clients, and the general public so please note that where there are no inspection times listed you can contact the agent directly to arrange a Private Inspection. We can also provide alternatives to meeting in person.

Description:
**FOR OPTIONS CURRENTLY AVAILABLE TO VIEW THE INSIDE OF THIS PROPERTY PLEASE CONTACT RYAN PAGAN ON 0438 757 358
Luxurious from the very onset, this extra large 85M2 + Balcony, two bedroom, two bathroom SUB PENTHOSUE apartment within the well sought after KIN apartment building, will tick all the boxes.
Exuding contemporary elegance, the open living zone is features floorboards throughout, serviced by an oversized, ultramodern kitchen with stone counters inc large island bench, soft-closing drawers, integrated dishwasher and stainless cooking appliances.
Excellent warmth and natural light is on offer through large glass windows facing North. Double sliding, glass doors open to a private, covered balcony allowing you to extend your entertaining outdoors.
2 Double bedrooms feature ample BIRs, the master boasting Walk in robes & a chic ensuite.
Large central bathroom & euro style laundry.
Additions of a secure undercover parking space, full height storage cage in front of your carpark, split system air conditioning, video intercom and lift access complete the package.
Quick pedestrian access to Strathmore Station & Napier street shops, & Cross Keys Reserve, also note immediate access to city link only a stones throw away.
Building FACTS
95 % SOLD
90% Owner Occupied Building
*** COVID-19 Announcement ***
Our office is committed to ensuring the safety of our staff and the general public, and in line with current government guidelines, we are NOT conducting open for inspections. If you have arranged a private viewing, you will be subject to strict criteria and guidelines upon attendance, including but not limited to:
- Displaying no symptoms of any kind
- Not touching any surface or hands being placed in pockets at all times
- Providing photo-ID upon entry
- Maintaining a distance of 2m from any staff member in attendance
-No children in attendance at viewings
- Lift usage restrictions
FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH ANY VERBAL INSTRUCTION BY A STAFF MEMBER WILL RESULT IN TERMINATION OF ANY PRIVATE VIEWING.

Description:
Online Auction on Wednesday, 14th of October 2020 at 6:00pm
Light and Style in an Exclusive Essendon Enclave
On its own separately-titled block with no shared land, this contemporary home presents an exceptional low-maintenance lifestyle opportunity thanks to its versatile two-level design, quality features throughout and incredibly convenient location. Every room bathed in natural light, the free-flowing interior showcases three generous bedrooms (all with built-in robes) together with a stylish master ensuite and two further bathrooms all with granite-top vanities. Adding to its floorplan flexibility is a separate lounge leading through to the spacious open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen with granite benchtops/breakfast bar, Bosch dishwasher and Smeg cooking appliances. Other distinctive additions include high square-set ceilings and solid hardwood floors and concealed laundry facilities, along with ducted heating and evaporative cooling for all-seasons enjoyment. Completing the picture is an upstairs balcony (from the master bedroom), private back garden with pergola and decking, plus an internally-accessed garage (remote-control) and additional driveway parking space. Exceptional inner-urban convenience, its walking distance to Glenbervie Station, Woodland Street shops and cafes and the open spaces of Salmon Reserve, as well as easy access to North Essendon Village, local schools (zoned to Strathmore Secondary College) and Citylink.
Insights: First listed on 29 September, this house has been on Domain for 21 days (last updated on 15 September). It was last sold in 2006 and 84 other 3 bedroom house in Essendon have recently been sold.

Description:
Private Negotiation By Pennisi
AVAILABLE TO INSPECT VIA 360 VIRTUAL TOUR.
Located on the corner of Cooper St this beautifully maintained two bedrooms unit is one of only 6 in the block.
The Obvious:
2 double bedrooms
Large lounge room
Separate kitchen and dining
Bathroom with double shower
Separate laundry
The Extras:
Heating and air conditioning in lounge
Polished floorboards
Off-street parking for one car right at your front door, entry off Cooper Street
Private small rear courtyard
Dishwasher and stainless steel cooktop
The Village:
Located close to Essendons many shops, parks and schools
The Clincher:
Ready to move in and enjoy the benefits of a small block in a wonderful location.
***PLEASE NOTE*** Due to Victorian Government restrictions all physical inspections are held privately with a Pennisi agent and a maximum of two prospective buyers from the same bubble.
Our team is working extended hours and all weekend to accommodate private inspections, however with more people requesting viewings than time slots available, appointments are allocated on a first in, first served basis for a maximum of 15 minutes.
To further protect our community, we invite you to view the 360 degree virtual tour before requesting a private inspection to ensure you are satisfied with the layout and location.
If you have viewed the virtual tour and are in a position to buy the property broadly within the indicated price, please call 9379 5616 to arrange a private viewing.
When your booking is confirmed, we'll greet you at the property with a smile (hidden behind our mask) instead of a handshake, then it's business as usual!
*Please DO NOT attend an inspection if you are feeling unwell, waiting for COVID test results or have been in contact with anyone who has recently been exposed to Covid-19.
Pennisi Real Estate Essendon thank you for your understanding and cooperation during this time and wish you every success with your property hunt.

Description:
Private Negotiation By Pennisi
The Obvious:
2 well-scaled double bedrooms plus a smaller third bedroom or study
Large lounge with box bay window
Well-equipped kitchen and genuine family-sized dining
Bathroom with separate shower, bath and vanity
Separate laundry with direct garage access
The Extras:
Boasting a front and back courtyard and private driveway
High ceilings
Good storage space
Ducted heating
The Village:
Renowned location close to North Essendon Village cafes, shops, Lincoln Park, schools and public transport.
The Clincher:
Generously proportioned throughout, this is a home that is sure to excite first-time buyers, discerning downsizers and investors.
***PLEASE NOTE*** Due to Victorian Government restrictions all physical inspections are held privately with a Pennisi agent and a maximum of two prospective buyers from the same bubble.
Our team is working extended hours and all weekend to accommodate private inspections, however with more people requesting viewings than time slots available, appointments are allocated on a first in, first served basis for a maximum of 15 minutes.
To further protect our community, we invite you to view the 360 degree virtual tour before requesting a private inspection to ensure you are satisfied with the layout and location.
If you have viewed the virtual tour and are in a position to buy the property broadly within the indicated price, please call 9379 5616 to arrange a private viewing.
When your booking is confirmed, we'll greet you at the property with a smile (hidden behind our mask) instead of a handshake, then it's business as usual!
*Please DO NOT attend an inspection if you are feeling unwell, waiting for COVID test results or have been in contact with anyone who has recently been exposed to Covid-19.
Pennisi Real Estate Essendon thank you for your understanding and cooperation during this time and wish you every success with your property hunt.

Description:
Mar Lodge Elegance
With the health and well-being of our community being front of mind we have additional measures in place at all property inspections. Our COVID-19 conditions of entry are available for your viewing click here: https://bit.ly/347XJd6
Tucked in the highly esteemed Mar Lodge Estate, this elegant four bedroom plus study Californian Bungalow exceeds expectations on grandly proportioned land of approximately 821m2. Introduced by colourful roses and enriched by lustrous jarrah floorboards and high ceilings, it showcases a spacious living room with open fireplace, adjoining sitting area, gourmet kitchen, dining room with bay window and generous entertainer's alfresco with clear café blinds. Sweeping stone countertops complement high end kitchen appliances including a 90cm Miele gas cooktop, Qasair rangehood, Miele oven and Asko dishwasher. Big bedrooms host built-in robes, two fully tiled bathrooms with rainfall showers include a spa ensuite, plus there's a powder room and laundry with outstanding storage. Green thumbs can grow fresh produce in the rear garden, which is equipped with a watering system. Solar power, video intercom, security cameras, an alarm, heating, cooling, tandem carport and shed add even more allure. Parks, schools, trams, cafes and shops are just a stroll.
Insights: 55 Market Street, Essendon VIC 3040 was last sold in 2009 and 46 other 4 bedroom house in Essendon have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime Land & Location With Approved Plans and Permits!
Situated perfectly within short driving distance to shops, public transport and all you need to live a convenient day to day life this home is well-proportioned and filled with natural light, the current homes interior showcases two bedrooms and a central bathroom, however, this is a rare investment/development opportunity that features 716m2 of prime land with easy access to the best of Essendon's offerings.
Capitalize on Residential Growth Zoning with approved plans and permits to construct two luxurious townhouses with views of the city from the rear proposed townhouse master bedroom or consider bringing your own dream project to life. The currently approved plans and permits both feature four bedrooms, three bathrooms and a secure two-car garage.
This property is located within moments from Essendon station, Convenient tram stop at the end of the street on Keilor Road, gyms close by, schools within walking distance, 10 minutes drive to Melbourne's famous Highpoint Shopping Centre and 10kms away from Melbourne Airport and under 9kms to Melbourne's CBD. Positioned for absolute convenience, its within easy reach too major freeways making the commute to work an easy one

204/956 Mt. alexander Road, Essendon Inspections are by appointment only (as advised in line with REIV regulations due to the CVD-19 rules) please call Kaye Gerlach on 0467.686.904 to arrange.
A new, very spacious apartment in central Essendon offering two generous bedrooms, one bathroom (fully appointed) with laundry, together with car park. Hop onto the tram or catch a train within 5 minutes and relax on weekends at the selection of cafes and restaurants nearby with Essendon North Shopping Centre nearby. Tastefully appointed, with quality fixtures and fittings, Euro. s/steel appliances, stone benchtops, split system heating/air conditioning and very generous terrace for entertaining and relaxing.

Description:
ATT: FIRST HOME BUYERS | Brand-New, Perfect, Private & Secure 1 Bedroom Apartment in Essendon
This well-located one bedroom apartment places you in the heart of Essendon and is only 15 minutes from the CBD. Immaculately presented with natural timber accents, stone benchtops and European appliances. Enjoy the afternoon sun with a good book from your west facing balcony. This property is perfect for first home buyers, investors or downsizers alike.
At a glance
> Total of 58sqm (50sqm internal + 8sqm external)
> Open-plan living and dining
> Stone-topped kitchen with Bosch appliances
> Fully tiled bathroom with chrome accents
> Spacious bedroom with BIR
> Timber floorboards and carpets underfoot
> Double glazed windows and furnishings
> Private balcony
> Car space plus storage.
Enjoy communal facilities with three landscaped garden areas, the rooftop oasis which includes teppanyaki grill & BBQ where you can take the spectacular views. Be placed you in a truly enviable position with the very best amenity on your doorstep such as public transport, an amazing selection of cafes, restaurants and bars, as well as green spaces like Windy Hill and Aberfeldie & Maribyrnong Parks.
We are still operating by working remotely and adhering to COVID-19 restrictions. We are unable to meet face to face with buyers. However, we are still available to assist you with your enquiry.
Disclaimer: The virtual tour and photography is generic in nature of apartments within the building, not necessarily this individual apartment.

58m²

Description:
Light, Location and a Fabulous Sense of Style!
Superbly renovated and ready for you to simply move in and enjoy, this fabulous first-floor abode is sure to make a lasting impression with its open floorplan, first-class features throughout and exceptional inner-urban convenience. Corner positioned and bathed in natural light, the apartment's lavish interior comprises two bedrooms (large master) both with built-in robes, together with a stylish bathroom complete with laundry facilities. Add to this a spacious and versatile living/dining area accompanied by a sleek modern kitchen with tiled splashbacks, soft-close drawers, butler's sink and Belling oven/induction cooktop. Quality flooring throughout, the apartment also boasts split-system heating and cooling, plus the added appeal of a secure entry foyer with intercom and off-street parking space (accessed via Glass Street). Enviably convenient, it's walking distance to Glenbervie Station, the open spaces of Salmon Reserve, as well as easy access to Woodland Street shops and cafes, North Essendon Village, Strathmore Secondary College (zoned) and Citylink.

Description:
Family-sized Designer Living, Opposite Parkland
With a remarkable sense of light-filled spaciousness and impeccable designer style, this contemporary, 3 bedroom executive townhouse offers a family-friendly sense of proportion, directly opposite the green expanses of Lincoln Park. Immaculately presented, in as new condition, the home is just a few moments from Mt Alexander Rds shops, cafes and city-bound trams.
Discover attractive polished timber under foot in a broad open-plan kitchen / dining / living that also highlights stone benches, superior stainless steel appliances and volumes of premium soft close cabinetry. Flowing effortlessly through glass sliding doors to a broad sun-drenched balcony, the space is ideally suited to al fresco dining and entertaining.
The master bedroom enjoys a sense of escape with its own ensuite and walk-in robes, whilst on the top-floor, the remaining two bedrooms are equipped with substantial built-in robes and share access to a family-sized bathroom in which the bath and shower are independent.
Importantly, a double lock-up garage offers families the ease of direct internal access to the main home, whilst other highlights include split system heating and cooling for year-round comfort.

Description:
Relaxed living inside and out.
In a highly sought-after pocket of Essendon, this elegant three-bedroom home has all the advantages of a low-maintenance townhouse with the space and versatility to suit young families, professionals working from home or downsizers. Its smart layout features both ground and first floor master options with ensuite, a large granite-top kitchen, bright north-facing dining and living zones and an inviting alfresco entertaining setting. Designed to be enjoyed, it features striking timber floors, evaporative cooling and ducted heating, security alarm, powder room, separate laundry and a large double garage, all close to public transport, local shops and cafés and with Buckley Park at the end of the street. Easy living with a touch of class and great access to Buckley Street buses, Keilor Road and North Essendon Village Shopping.
Please note during Victorian Government Stage 4 COVID-19 Restrictions a physical inspection of property is prohibited. We welcome your enquiry to discuss this property in more detail.
Insights: 3/74 Nimmo Street, Essendon VIC 3040 was last sold in 2020 and 84 other 3 bedroom house in Essendon have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand new town residence in a stunning location.
Graced with high end attention to detail and a modern elegance that will be adored by so many, this brand new 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom townhouse is an exciting family opportunity in one of Essendons most sought-after locations.
An entry steps into the free-flowing and open central living zone, which is dominated by high end timber flooring and has room for both dedicated family and dining zones. Included in this everyday living hub is the deluxe kitchen which has trendy pendant lighting hanging over the island bench as well as offering pristine stone detail, superb storage options, and stainless steel appliances.
The master bedroom boasts a downstairs location and offers fabulous space along with a stylish ensuite and walk-in robe. Upstairs, 3 additional bedrooms all have excellent storage (1 bed with walk in robe), with this top level also enjoying a bathroom with separate powder room and a study/living zone. Other property features include an easy care north-facing garden and courtyard, downstairs powder room, sizeable laundry, reverse cycle heating and cooling, secure alarm, shed, rainwater tank, and a double remote garage.
A stones throw to Lincoln Park and close to Essendon North Primary School, Buckley Park College, Aberfeldie Park and Maribyrnong River walking trail, great local shopping strips on Keilor Road and Mt Alexander Road, Moonee Ponds Central Shopping Centre, DFO Essendon, buses, trams, Essendon Station, and major arterials.
In line with Government Regulations during COVID-19, inspections are by appointment only.
Insights: 46 other 4 bedroom house in Essendon have recently been sold.

Description:
Premier Location - Low Maintenance Lifestyle
With the health and well-being of our community being front of mind we have additional measures in place at all property inspections. Our COVID-19 conditions of entry are available for your viewing click here: https://go.aws/2Z5oMmV
Be inspired by this comfortable two bedroom unit in fashionable Essendon. Comprising gracious lounge/living room with beautiful bay windows, looking out to a relaxing garden patio surrounded by mature trees and plants, the kitchen has stainless steel Bosch appliances, including wall oven and separate cooktop, easy to clean smooth glass splash back and a skylight beaming natural light into the adjoining family/meals area. Both bedrooms are fully carpeted, both with bay windows, plus built in robes with mirrored doors and ceiling fans. The central bathroom has a large frameless glass shower, modern wall tiles and ceiling heat lamp. Laundry has a back door to a second outdoor patio area, fully undercover with private rear access to a single lock up garage. Other features include extra off street parking, security entrance gate, alternative side gate access, split system wall unit and a lovely well maintained garden setting for entertaining friends or enjoying long afternoon teas in the sun. Very close to transport, shops, schools and recreational facilities. Enjoy a low maintenance lifestyle in a premier locale.
Insights: 1/33 Grice Crescent, Essendon VIC 3040 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 2 bedroom unit in Essendon have recently been sold.
